title: Why Spotify Is Betting Big on Podcasts in Battle Against Apple
text: Mitchell Green, Lead Edge Capital partner, and Bloomberg's Mark Gurman discuss Spotify Technology SA's big bet on podcasts with Bloomberg's Emily Chang on "Bloomberg Technology."

title: Apple retail chief's departure shakes up leadership structure
text: CNBC's Josh Lipton reports on how the departure of Apple retail chief Angela Ahrendts shakes up the leadership structure at the tech company.

title: Apple Names New Retail Chief as IPhone Era Wanes
text: Apple names company veteran Deirdre O'Brien as the new retail chief. She is replacing Angela Ahrendts, who is leaving the company in April. O'Brien will also continue to lead human resources. Bloomberg's Mark Gurman reports on "Bloomberg Markets: European Close."

title: Apple's Deirdre O'Brien named SVP of Retail and People
text: CNBC's Josh Lipton reports on the departure of Apple retail chief Angela Ahrendts and who will replace her.

title: Jim Cramer on Apple, Inc.
text: Happy earnings season! Katherine Ross & Jim Cramer on the floor of the NYSE.

title: Apple retail chief Angela Ahrendts to depart in April
text: Dan Howley of Yahoo Finance discusses why Angela Ahrendts may leaving Apple.

title: Outgoing Apple retail chief Angela Ahrendts in 2017
text: CNBC’s Josh Lipton spoke to outgoing Apple retail chief Angela Ahrendts in 2017. They met at the opening of Chicago’s flagship store. Here’s what was discussed.

title: Tech stocks rebound
text: Kari Firestone of Aureus Asset Management joins the "Fast Money Halftime Report" team to discuss tech stocks rebounding and if it's time to buy in.
